Doyinsola Hamidat Abiola onye nke eji Doyin Abiola mara bụ managing director na-achikwata ụlọ ọrụ Concord news agency
Doyin bụkwa nwaanyi izizi nwetara ọkwa onye nhazi akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Nigerian daily
Dọkịta Doyin Abiola nwetara nzere digiri na Asụsụ Bekee nakwa ihe gbasara mmepụta egwuregwu site na University of Ibadan  n'afọ 1969
Ka Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ,o bidoro ọrụ n;ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkụ a kpọrọ 'Daily Sketch' n'afọ 1969
N'oge a, ọ malitere ide ihe ederede nke a kpọrọ Tiro bụ nke na-egosipụta nsogbu na mmekpa ahụ metụtara  ọha na eze,tụmadị ihe gbasara ịkpa oke n'etiti nwoke na nwaanyị
N'afọ 1970, ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Daily Sketch wee gaa Obodo oyibo ije gụ akwụkwọ maka nzere Mastas n'ihe gbasara ịchụ nta akụkọ
Ka  ọ  si obodo oyibo lọta e were ya ọrụ dika onye odee n'akwụkwọ akụkọ  Daily Times
Ọ bụ nke a ka ọ megidere wee bụrụzie onye isi na-enyoche ihe akụkọ edere ede
O mechara gaa New York University ebe ọ nọ nweta nzere   PhD n;ihe gbasara mgbasa akụkọ nakwa ihe gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchichị n'afọ 1979
Ka ọ lọchitere azụ  Nigeria , ọ gakwara n'ụlọ ọrụ 'Dail Time ede o sonyeziri n'oyu bọọdụ ndị na-ahazi akụkọ ederede, ụfọdụ n'ime ha bụ  Stanley Macebuh, Dele Giwa na Amma Ogan
Mana, ọ rụrụ ebe a obere oge n;ihi na  ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkụ 'National Concord ebidoro ọhụụ nyere ọrụ dika onye izizi ga arụ dika onye isi n'ịhazi akụkọ
E mchara bugoo ya nọkwa dika 'Managing Director/Editor in Chief n'afọ 1986
Ọkwa a mere ya nwaanyị mbụ nọgoro n'ụdị ọkwa na Nigeria
Dr
Doyin Abiola bu kwa nwunye onye izizi bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ nke a kpọrọ 'National Concord Newspaper' Chief Moshood Abiola onye nke ọ lụrụ n'afọ 1981
Doyin Abiola rụtere ọrụ aka n'ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Concord
Ọ nọkwara n'ọkwa di iche iche na Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye isi oche na mmeme  ihe onyinye nke mbụ emere na Nigeria nke  a kpọrọ 'Nigerian Merit Award'
Ọ bụ onye otu kansulu ndụmọdụ nke  Ngalaba  Social and Management Sciences nke dị na Ogun State University
Ọnwetara nkwanye ugwu na ihe onyinye  di iche iche  dika 'Diamond Award maka Media Excellence' (DAME) maka mbọ niile ọ na-agba iji akụkọ ederede wee kọwapụta ụzọ ndozi  na ọchichị obodo
Ndị Nlekọta nke DAME jikọtara aka  wee nye ya onyinye nke a kpọrọ 'Lifetime Achievement Award na mmeme ha mere
Ọ bụ nwanyị nke abụọ natara Onyinye a onye nke mbụ bọ Oriakụ  (Omobola Onajide)
E nyekwara  ya  ikike iso n'otu ndi Felow nke Eisenhower Fellowship n'afọ 1986
